entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
